channel.title: Projects on Vishal shah
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Vishal shah

item.title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
item.description: • Built and implemented an information retrieval and classification system for sentiment analysis on tweets in Python • Extracted and cleaned tweets from user’s profile using Twitter API and used Python libraries like tweepy and textblob • Segmented the tweets into positive, negative, or neutral language using subjectivity and polarity scores

item.title: Stock Market Prediction Using Deep Learning
item.description: Imported daily price history of NASDAQ stocks from website using Python wrapper and API key Developed a model that predicted the opening and closing price of a stock using LSTM and Keras Trained 30 neural networks using different parameter combinations and compared the results by calculating RSME Implemented a weekly Credit Spread Strategy using data of predicted closing price producing monthly return of 24%

item.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction
item.description: Developed a model that predicted bitcoin’s price for the next 30 days using Random Forest Regression. Performed feature extraction, handled missing data using Mean value Imputation. Analyzed and performed exploratory data analysis on data set in Python and achieved an accuracy of 77%.

item.title: Music Recommendation system
item.description: 1 Extracted data from KKBOX and performed Big data manipulation in Apache Hive and Spark 2 Visualized captivating heatmaps from data using seaborn and matplotlib libraries in Python 3 Conducted feature extraction and fit the data into Random Forest and XGBoost to achieve an accuracy of 73%
